programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: A boy with facial differences enters fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time.

programme.title: The Peanut Butter Falcon
programme.desc: Zak runs away from his care home to make his dream of becoming a wrestler come true.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother.

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: Based on the true story of one family caught in the 2004 tsunami that devastated Southeast Asia.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's A Madea Christmas
programme.desc: Madea dispenses her unique form of holiday spirit when she helps a friend pay her daughter a surprise visit.

programme.title: How the Gringo Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Bennie's daughter surprises him by arriving home with her brand new boyfriend - an uninvited GRINGO.

programme.title: Guess Who's Coming to Christmas
programme.desc: To repair his image, a rock star must spend one week with a reverend and his family during the holidays.

programme.title: Letters at Christmas
programme.desc: While renovating an old hotel, a divorcing couple's marriage gets a chance when the kids find old love letters

programme.title: Santa Claus: The Movie
programme.desc: The story of a master toymaker who discovers a magical kingdom of elves at the North Pole and becomes Santa!

programme.title: It's Christmas, Carol!
programme.desc: A heartless exec is haunted by her dead ex-boss--who is the ghost of Christmas past, present, and future.

programme.title: Season's Greetings
programme.desc: Will takes over a greeting card company, disrupting the life of its most famous writer, Darcy Blake.

programme.title: Christmas in Paradise
programme.desc: Three quirky sisters chase their missing dad to the Caribbean and find life, love, and laughter.

programme.title: Thomas Kinkade's Christmas Cottage
programme.desc: Thomas Kinkade was motivated to begin his art career after his mother almost lost their family home.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: A female detective teams up with an amateur sleuth to find her missing father.
